story.kicker_image_caption: Gokulraj, a 21-year-old Dalit boy, was killed by S Yuvraj for talking to a Hindu girl.
story.storykicker: The 34-year-old Yuvaraj, considered Robin Hood of south, is accused of murdering Gokulraj, a 21-year-old Dalit boy for talking to a Hindu girl.
story.storybody:
The leader of a right wing caste outfit S Yuvraj , who was in jail for six months in connection with the honor killing of a Dalit boy, received a hero like welcome after being released on bail, in Vellore yeasterday.

Walking out of the prison to loud cheers of his supporters, Dheeran Chinnamalai Gounder Peravai aka Yuvaraj, told media that he has enough evidence to prove that Gokulraj committed suicide and DSP Vishnupriya's death was a planned murder.

ROBIN HOOD OF SOUTH

The 34-year-old Yuvaraj, considered Robin Hood of south, is accused of murdering Gokulraj, a 21-year-old Dalit boy for talking to a Hindu girl.

According to sources, Gokulraj was seen talking to a girl from the Gounder community at a Tiruchengode temple. The boy was later was abducted by Yuvraj's men and was reportedly roughed up for talking to a upper caste girl.

Gokulraj's headless body was found on the railway tracks near Erode, the next day on June 24 last year.

TOOTHLESS POLICE

Consequently, a case under Goondas Act was filed against Yuvraj and Tamilnadu Police began a search which lasted for 110 days. Walking into the Namakkal CB-CID office with hundreds of his followers, Yuvraj surrender to the cops on October 11, 2015.

While earlier the cops had claimed that the case was very strong as they found evidence of Gokulraj's belongings in Yuvraj's car, nothing was done to fortify the case.

With no evidence to substantiate the charges against Yuvraj, Madras High Court quashed the Goondas Act over him.
story.magazinekicker: The 34-year-old Yuvaraj, considered Robin Hood of south, is accused of murdering Gokulraj, a 21-year-old Dalit boy for talking to a Hindu girl.
story.shortheadline: Accused of Dalit boy murder, caste outfit leader Yuvraj walks out of jail like a hero

briefcase_content.briefcase: 34-year-old Yuvaraj walks out of jail like a hero.
Madras High Court quashed the Goondas Act against Yuvraj.
Yuvaraj is prime accused in the alleged murder of a Dalit youth for talking to a girl.
